subSubSection.paragraph:
COLLECTION MATERIAL . —
Burkina Faso
•
1♂ ( SVL 16.3 mm ); Comoé province , Dérégoué ; 10.75011°N , – 4.07934°W ;
320 m a.s.l.
;
II.1983
; J. Heath leg.; ZFMK 93966
.

DESCRIPTION. — 39 specimens examined. Voucher specimens morphologically similar to frogs described by Rödel (2000) . Similar to
P. francisci
but the warts on the neck often less distinct in
P. latifrons .
Breeding males with a completely smooth skin ( Fig. 5F ), ( Rödel 2000 ). A yellow vocal sac in males (black in
P. francisci
) and a more pronounced black lateral bands distinguishing
P. latifrons
from
P. francisci
.
